name: ZOMBIES, RUN! Running game & audio adventure for iOS/Android
blurb: Rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse by running in the real world, with story and gameplay coming through your headphones

name: Six to Start and Naomi Alderman

rewards.reward: The dead can\u2019t donate: Get your name in the SURVIVOR\u2019S Register in the game\u2019s credits! You\u2019ll also receive our heartfelt thanks for not being a soulless corpse.

Help rebuild civilization by becoming a RECRUIT and receiving the game before anyone else! It\u2019s dangerous to go alone, so we\u2019ll also provide some extra in-game protection and all the Season 1 content (worth $20+), plus a place on the Survivor\u2019s Register.

Prefer eating brains? Become a ZOMBIE in the game by calling up our hotline and giving us your best \u201chelp, my trachea is falling out of my rotten neck\u201d impression. For science. Plus the game and your name in the credits!

Promoted to LOOKOUT, eh? Show off your new status to the folks in the shattered remains of your local bar with a snazzy T-SHIRT or POSTER. That\u2019ll let everyone know you\u2019re into the beta test and on the Survivor\u2019s Register as well, you badass.

SCOUT: Looks like someone\u2019s flagged you for the roll of honour. Your donation means we\u2019ll NAME SOMETHING IN THE GAME after you, like a park or a street or a dead guy. It\u2019s just like being president but without the sex scandals. You\u2019re even important enough to get a T-Shirt AND a poster, plus the rest. We are not worthy.

BACKSTAGE PASS: There's more going on than meets the eye here, so we're going to welcome you back to where the magic happens. Hang out with us in online chats, get your questions answered and give feedback. Plus, you'll be invited to a mission-brainstorming session - we guarantee to make at least one of the ideas from that session, and if it's your idea, your name will be in it as a character of your choice! You also get the RUNNERS' FIELD GUIDE and all the above.

RANGER: OK. Now you\u2019ve proved yourself worth some proper training, we just can\u2019t afford to lose you. That means you get a copy of the RUNNERS\u2019 FIELD GUIDE containing top-secret survival techniques we reserve for our elite runners. And all the above rewards.

Be a RUNNER and save the world! Name and create your own in-game character with our writers, receive personalised dog tags, running swag, and all the awesome equipment listed above. It's like being 006 or 008! Without you, we\u2019d all be eating stone soup before the end of the week.

[EARLY-BIRD DISCOUNT] Serious support receives serious rewards. All the supplies our intrepid Runners are out collecting - the food, the canned drinks, the medicine? We\u2019ll work with you to NAME A BRAND or item in Zombies, Run!

Serious support receives serious rewards. All the supplies our intrepid Runners are out collecting - the food, the canned drinks, the medicine? We\u2019ll work with you to NAME A BRAND or item in Zombies, Run!

Organising a charity race? We\u2019ll add zombies. Regular training group? Make them into zombies. How about a marathon-themed wedding? Time for zombies. We\u2019ll create a CUSTOM MISSION that turns your run into a bespoke, action-packed, zombie-infested spectacular.
